app.name: RealStack
app.description: A decentralized platform for real-world asset tokenization and trading

hero.title: Tokenize Real-World Assets on
hero.subtitle: RealStack bridges physical assets to blockchain, creating a more accessible, transparent, and efficient marketplace for tokenized real-world assets.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Invest in premium real-world assets with minimal entry barriers and fractional ownership.

enhancedLiquidity.title: Enhanced Liquidity
enhancedLiquidity.description: Easily buy, sell, or trade asset tokens on Solana with low fees and rapid settlement.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Verified assets with detailed documentation and transparent ownership history.

governance.title: Community Governance
governance.description: Participate in key decisions through the REAL token governance system.

fractionalOwnership.title: Fractional Ownership
fractionalOwnership.description: Divide assets into smaller, more affordable digital shares

globalAccess.title: Global Access
globalAccess.description: Connect with investors worldwide without intermediaries

realEstate.description: Commercial properties, residential units, and land investments

business.description: Small business equity, revenue shares, and franchise opportunities

collectible.description: High-value art, rare items, and premium collectibles

verification.title: Asset Verification
verification.description: Each asset undergoes thorough verification, including legal ownership confirmation, professional valuation, and compliance screening.

tokenization.title: Tokenization
tokenization.description: Assets are converted into digital tokens on the Solana blockchain, representing fractional ownership with appropriate legal structuring.

distribution.title: Distribution
distribution.description: Tokens are made available to investors through our marketplace, with transparent pricing and accessibility.

management.title: Management & Returns
management.description: Assets are professionally managed, with returns and income distributed to token holders according to their ownership stake.

cta.title: Ready to Start Investing in Real-World Assets?
cta.text: Join the RealStack platform today and access a diverse portfolio of tokenized assets.

market.title: Asset Marketplace
market.description: Discover and invest in tokenized real-world assets

search.noResults: No assets found matching your criteria
search.adjustFilters: Try adjusting your filters or check back later for new listings

register.title: Create your account
register.name: Full Name
register.agreement: I agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
errors.passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
